NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
April 22, 1953
Professor Frank Byrnes
Ohio Slate University
Colmtms 10, (Mo
Dear Frank Byrnes*
Following your meeting with Allen l&ller, the HAEB Board of Directors approved
of the exchange of two memberships between HA® and AAACR* I believe it was
understood that the exchange would be on the basis of no charge to either
association and that the representatives would be the president of each
and the executive director of each. The mm president is Graydon fwmm,
Director of Radio and Television, University of Alabama, University, Alabama*
will get all of his mail* This will simplify changing the official records
within the next few weeks*
HA® is looking forward to the mutual benefits which will come about throu#
closer liaison*
Sincerely yours,
Executive Director
Allen Hiller
Robert VanDuyn
